item.title: Docker ENTRYPOINT or CMD?
item.description: ENTRYPOINT Defines the executable invoked when the container is started CMD specifies the argument that get passed to the ENTRYPOINT

item.title: Docker ENTRYPOINT shell or exect?
item.description: When you define a Docker image with Dockefile, you have 2 options with ENTRYPOINT instruction shell form - ENTRYPOINT node app.
